text:
 n epochs: The number of training epochs (e.g. 1000).
 n batch: The number of samples to include in each mini-batch (e.g. 32).
 n diff: The diﬀerence order (e.g. 0 or 12).
Some additional hyperparameters that you may wish to investigate are the use of two
convolutional layers before a pooling layer, the repetition of the convolutional and pooling layer
pattern, the use of dropout, and more. We will deﬁne a very simple CNN model with one
convolutional layer and one max pooling layer.
